descriptionHtml:
Have you ever been disappointed that the most badass armor in the game didn\'t have a badass texture to go with it?

Well now there is!!! This retexture of the ebony mail makes it all the more badass by making it a lot darker and adding several designs to the chestpiece. The shadow designs are more defined and make it look somewhat corrupted, which is the whole point of the armor. It works for both male and female versions of the armor. 

Please look thru ALL the pictures, because they are slightly mixed up.

Manual Installation:
There is a readme file in the zip, just drag and drop the files into your skyrim/data directory.

This mod will be incompatible with any other mods that edit the ebony mail\'s textures, and if you are using the bethesda official HD texture pack, then you must load this mod after the pack.

Steam Workshop link: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=89081029&searchtext= 

If you enjoy the mod, please rate 5 stars.
author: Raptor
